DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter , randomize , open-label , active-controlled Phase 3 study maintenance treatment anemia subject NDD-CKD
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Evaluate Vadadustat Maintenance Treatment Anemia Subjects With Non-dialysis-dependent Chronic Kidney Disease ( NDD-CKD )
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , open-label , active-controlled Phase 3 study efficacy safety vadadustat versus darbepoetin alfa maintenance treatment anemia subject NDD-CKD
DOC.criteria: ≥18 year age Diagnosis CKD eGFR ≤60 mL/min/1.73 m^2 Screening expect start dialysis within 6 month Screening Currently maintain ESA therapy , last dose receive within 8 week prior Screening Mean Screening HGB 8.0 11.0 g/dL ( inclusive ) US 9.0 12.0 g/dL ( inclusive ) outside US Uncontrolled hypertension Severe heart failure Screening ( New York Heart Association Class IV ) Acute coronary syndrome ( hospitalization unstable angina myocardial infarction ) , urgent coronary revascularization , hospitalization CHF , stroke within 12 week prior Screening
